services.name: Manual Therapy
services.description: Manual therapy is a hands-on treatment that involves mobilizing or manipulating joints and soft tissues to help reduce pain, increase range of motion, and improve function.

services.name: IMS
services.description: Intramuscular stimulation (IMS) is a treatment that involves the insertion of fine needles into the muscles to help relieve pain and improve function. IMS is often used to treat chronic pain and musculoskeletal conditions.

services.name: Acupuncture
services.description: Acupuncture is a treatment that involves the insertion of fine needles into specific points on the body to help relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and improve overall health and well-being.

services.name: TMJ
services.description: TMJ treatment is a type of therapy that focuses on relieving pain and improving function in the temporomandibular joint (TMJ). TMJ treatment may involve a combination of manual therapy, acupuncture, and other techniques.

services.name: Sports Therapy
services.description: Sports therapy is a type of treatment that is designed to help athletes and active individuals recover from injuries, improve performance, and prevent future injuries. Sports therapy may involve a combination of manual therapy, exercise, and other techniques.

services.name: Personal Therapy
services.description: Personal therapy is a type of treatment that is designed to help individuals improve their overall health and well-being. Personal therapy may involve a combination of manual therapy, exercise, nutrition counseling, and other techniques.

services.name: Myofascial Therapy
services.description: Myofascial therapy is a type of treatment that focuses on releasing tension and pain in the myofascial tissues, which are the connective tissues that surround and support the muscles. Myofascial therapy may involve a combination of manual therapy, exercise, and other techniques.
